title: Show Time Spanish – Promo
description: This promo provides some information about Show Time Spanish which launches on Saturday 18th October 2008 and will help you take your Spanish to the next stage. Subscribe for free to our weekly lessons.  Members | Purchase | RSS | iTunes link
content:encoded:
